title: Does anyone know if you can play on the Oceanic servers from the Philippines?
body:
I don't mean in terms of IP blocking, but whether there is a ping issue? I mean 300+ ping would be pretty detrimental.

I'm just curious because I have a friend from the Philippines switching from Garena to LoL and wants to play on the Oceanic servers.

replies.body:
You can, there is no IP block.

You most likely will be playing with 100 - 150 from Philippines but don't quote me on that since I don't know how much routing exactly is between here and there, so can also be 200 or worse.

Have a try I say.
